mapper.sql: id, product_no, supply_no,supply_pd_no, supply_pd_name, supply_pd_rule, supply_pd_size, brand_id, brand_name, refrence_price, recent_enquiry, create_user_id, create_time, edit_user_id, edit_time, udf1, udf2, udf3, udf4, udf5, udf6, udf7, udf8, udf9, udf10, udf11, udf12, udf13, udf14, udf15, udf16, udf17, udf18, udf19, udf20

p.id, p.product_no, p.supply_no, p.supply_pd_no, p.supply_pd_name, p.supply_pd_rule, p.supply_pd_size, p.brand_id, p.brand_name, p.refrence_price, p.recent_enquiry, p.create_user_id, p.create_time, p.edit_user_id, p.edit_time, p.udf1, p.udf2, p.udf3, p.udf4, p.udf5, p.udf6, p.udf7, p.udf8, p.udf9, p.udf10, p.udf11, p.udf12, p.udf13, p.udf14, p.udf15, p.udf16, p.udf17, p.udf18, p.udf19, p.udf20
mapper.select: select , sku.min_uint,upc.identifying_code,ca.class_name from sku_partner p left join sku_core sku on p.product_no=sku.product_no left join sku_upc upc on upc.product_no=p.product_no left join category ca on sku.category_no=ca.class_code
mapper.insert: insert into sku_partner (id, product_no, supply_no, supply_pd_no, supply_pd_name, supply_pd_rule, supply_pd_size, brand_id, brand_name, refrence_price, recent_enquiry, create_user_id, create_time, edit_user_id, edit_time, udf1, udf2, udf3, udf4, udf5, udf6, udf7, udf8, udf9, udf10, udf11, udf12, udf13, udf14, udf15, udf16, udf17, udf18, udf19, udf20) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplyPdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplyPdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplyPdRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplyPdSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refrencePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{recentEnquiry,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{editUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{editTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{udf1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{udf2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{udf3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{udf4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{udf5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{udf6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{udf7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{udf8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{udf9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{udf10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{udf11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{udf12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{udf13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{udf14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{udf15,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{udf16,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{udf17,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{udf18,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{udf19,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{udf20,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update sku_partner
product_no = #{productNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supply_no = #{supplyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supply_pd_no = #{supplyPdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supply_pd_name = #{supplyPdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supply_pd_rule = #{supplyPdRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supply_pd_size = #{supplyPdSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brand_name = #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
refrence_price = #{refrencePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
recent_enquiry = #{recentEnquiry,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
edit_user_id = #{editUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
udf1 = #{udf1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
udf2 = #{udf2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
udf3 = #{udf3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
udf4 = #{udf4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
udf5 = #{udf5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
udf6 = #{udf6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
udf7 = #{udf7,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
udf8 = #{udf8,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
udf9 = #{udf9,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
udf10 = #{udf10,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
udf11 = #{udf11,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
udf12 = #{udf12,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
udf13 = #{udf13,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
udf14 = #{udf14,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
udf15 = #{udf15,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
udf16 = #{udf16,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
udf17 = #{udf17,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
udf18 = #{udf18,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
udf19 = #{udf19,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
udf20 = #{udf20,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sku_partner set product_no = #{productNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supply_no = #{supplyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supply_pd_no = #{supplyPdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supply_pd_name = #{supplyPdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supply_pd_rule = #{supplyPdRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supply_pd_size = #{supplyPdSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand_name = #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refrence_price = #{refrencePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, recent_enquiry = #{recentEnquiry,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, edit_user_id = #{editUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, udf1 = #{udf1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, udf2 = #{udf2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, udf3 = #{udf3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, udf4 = #{udf4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, udf5 = #{udf5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, udf6 = #{udf6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, udf7 = #{udf7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, udf8 = #{udf8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, udf9 = #{udf9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, udf10 = #{udf10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, udf11 = #{udf11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, udf12 = #{udf12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, udf13 = #{udf13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, udf14 = #{udf14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, udf15 = #{udf15,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, udf16 = #{udf16,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, udf17 = #{udf17,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, udf18 = #{udf18,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, udf19 = #{udf19,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, udf20 = #{udf20,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
